info.name: Hackathon
info.description: Here are the various SITA Day of Travel Services APIs.

item.name: Airports info - get distance between airports

request.description: This operation returns information about the given airport code. The code must be the 3\4 letter IATA\ICAO code.

body.raw:
<request languageCode="en">
   <flightDetails departDate="YYYYMMDD" departHHMM="19:10" arriveHHMM="20:30" departure="DUB" arrival="IST" flightNumber="212">
                <leg depAirportCode="DUB" arrAirportCode="LHR" flightNumber="123"/>
                <leg depAirportCode="LHR" arrAirportCode="GVA" flightNumber="345"/>
                <leg depAirportCode="NYC" arrAirportCode="IST" flightNumber="678"/>
   </flightDetails>
   <bagTags>
   <bagTag bookingRef="PNR1253" boardingNumber="OutOfScope" passengerItineraryID="Optional">
                   <passengers>
                                <passenger>
                                                <bagIdentifiers>
                                                               <bagIdentifier LPN=""  uniqueData="????"/>
                                                               <bagIdentifier LPN=""  uniqueData="????"/>
                                                </bagIdentifiers>
                                                <firstName>TEST</firstName>
                                                <lastName>TESTER</lastName>
                                                <title>MR</title>
                                                <address>
                                                                <name>Optional</name>
                                                                <street>Optional</street>
                                                                <city>Optional</city>
                                                                <state>Optional</state>
                                                                <country>Optional</country>
                                                </address>
                                </passenger>
                   </passengers>
    </bagTag>
    </bagTags>
</request>

request.description: Issue a printable bag tag for a passenger.

item.name: Beacons - Get all Beacons for an airport

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
header.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Encoding
header.description: The type of encoding used on the data.

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

item.name: Beacons - Get info for a Beacon

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<Request type="reissue" id="50" LanguageCode="en" emailAddress="your email " mobileNumber="+4477....." gate="212" boardingHHMM="18:40" departHHMM="19:10" arriveHHMM="20:30" ffMiles="" DepartTerminal="Term 2" ffTier="" message="Sample" CabinName="Economy" > <Barcode firstName="TEST" lastName="TESTER" title="MR" formatCode="M" passengerDescription="1" sourceOfCheckIn="M" sourceOfBoardingPass="M" documentType="B" airlineDesignator="14" baggageTagNumber="85123456003" ><Legs><Leg bookingRef="P12345" depAirportCode="DUB" arrAirportCode="LHR" carrier="14" flightNumber="603" depDate="2017-05-20" classCode="Y" seatNumber="33A" seqNumber="2" passengerStatus="1" airlineNumericCode="14" ticketNumber="2300293153" selecteeIndicator="0" internationalDocVerification="1" marketingCarrier="14" ffAirline="14" ffNumber="123456789" IdAdIndicator="0" freeBaggageAllowance="2PC" airlineUseData=""> </Leg></Legs> </Barcode> <Parameters> <Parameter name="BagStatus">Loaded </Parameter> </Parameters> </Request>

request.description: Boarding pass api call to update fields on the boarding pass.  You can change gate, times, seat, bag status, etc.

body.raw: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Request LanguageCode="en" emailAddress="youremail.com" mobileNumber="+intlnumber" gate="212" boardingHHMM="18:40" departHHMM="19:10" arriveHHMM="20:30" ffMiles="" DepartTerminal="Term 2" ffTier="" message="Sample" CabinName="Economy" > <Barcode firstName="TEST" lastName="TESTER" title="MR" formatCode="M" passengerDescription="1" sourceOfCheckIn="M" sourceOfBoardingPass="M" documentType="B" airlineDesignator="14" baggageTagNumber="85123456003" ><Legs><Leg bookingRef="P12345" depAirportCode="DUB" arrAirportCode="LHR" carrier="14" flightNumber="603" depDate="2017-05-20" classCode="Y" seatNumber="2A" seqNumber="2" passengerStatus="1" airlineNumericCode="14" ticketNumber="2300293153" selecteeIndicator="0" internationalDocVerification="1" marketingCarrier="14" ffAirline="14" ffNumber="123456789" IdAdIndicator="0" freeBaggageAllowance="2PC" airlineUseData=""> </Leg></Legs> </Barcode> <Parameters><Parameter name="BagStatus">Checked </Parameter> </Parameters> </Request>

request.description: Issue a mobile boarding pass for airline '14' to be delivered to passenger's mobile phone.

Flight Info Get Flights Arr 4+ hours
Flight Info Get Flights Arr for Airline

request.description: Get flights arriving at an airport for a particular airline.

item.name: Flight Info Get Flight Record for Arr flight

request.description: Need to supply airport code, airline and flight number
